caption.p: Ensemble members ( k‐medoids) for the Boyne (ID: 7012; 2070–2099; RCP 8.5) subselected using the partitioning around medoids algorithm (a). Also shown are percent changes in the mean annual amount (harmonic mean; b) and seasonality (harmonic amplitude; c) of the precipitation cycle described using a single‐phase harmonic function (equation (2)). Changes are examined for three future time horizons relative to the 1976–2005 baseline and for four different RCP scenarios and three future time horizons: 2010–2036 (2020s), 2040–2069 (2050s), and 2070–2099 (2080s). Plots are developed using the subselected Global Climate Model simulations (CMIP5_Sub) from the CMIP5 archive stored at a monthly resolution for all 215 catchments (Table S3). Boxplots show the median (central mark; q2) along with the 25th (bottom; q1) and 75th (top edges; q3) percentiles. Whiskers extend to q2 ± 1.57(q3 − q1)/sqrt (ens), where ens is the number of ensemble members. RCP = Representative Concentration Pathways; CMIP5 = Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 5.
